title: Competitive:Disruptor

- 1.1 Use

- 1.2 Synergy

- 1.3 Countermeasures

When the Disruptor is thrown, it explodes on contact with surfaces and players. It lasts for 5 seconds, and the effected Inkling's * abilities are changed in the following ways:

- Running speed is decreased by about 45%.

- Swimming speed is decreased by about 65%.

- Ink consumption is increased.

- Ink recovery rate is reduced.

- Upon submersion, the affected Inkling will glow, revealing their position.

- Jump height is reduced.
